titleStmt.title: Victorious newes from Ireland being a battail fought by the Lord of Ormond, the nineteenth day of June, to the losse of two thousand of the rebels, ten miles beyond Limbrick, sent in letter to Master Thomas Flinge,
titleStmt.author: Burgine, Darby.
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
